Articles.Content: Now that the SPH and VAB have save prompts, would someone care to mod in Esc key support for them just like you can quickly key out of the Tracking Station? Also the R&D labs & Astro Center don't have Esc key support. I play science sandbox so not sure about the rest. It always seemed odd to me that you can only Esc key out of the Tracking Station - I mean even before there was a save prompt in the VAB/SPH it would auto-save your ship when heading to the launch pad so why not on quick Esc?
